captions.text:
You were the one who left me
You know that it hurt me

I wandered because
I didn't know what love is
But I lived only for you Babe

From some point we
Started to watch how we act

We both look like
We have something to say tonight

But I think I know what you
Want to say

I want the time to stop
Go back, back

Back to when we
Were still pure

It all passes by like that
The good memories
Just stop like that

Turn me back to
That time when I was pure

Turn me back to that time
When I smiled brightly

Turn me back to that time
I'm starting to feel sad this dawn

I still love you 
I still can't forget you

One punch for your mind
Brave Sound

I curse you but later
I feel sad again

Back back back to those time
When we were happy

Those times where we
Drew our future

The day and night 
Smile and tears that we shared

I still can't believe it
Those vivid memories
This dawn will end too

It's all memories now
The love game that hurt me

Turn me back to
That time when I was pure

Turn me back to that time
When I smiled brightly

Turn me back to that time
I'm starting to feel sad this dawn

I still love you 
I still can't forget you

I still love you 
I still can't forget you

1Punch
Turn me back

comments.text:
1Punch yeni bir grup. Bu yüzden Bigbang, SHINee, B.A.P, Beast, EXO gibi 
gruplarla karşılaştırma yapılmamalıdır. Şuan Kore'nin büyük grupları bu 
çaylaklık döneminden geçmiştir. Ve ben şuna inanıyorum ki 1Punch iyi 
yerlere gelebilecek, yolu açık bir ikili grup. Stilleri ve tarzları çok 
farklı. Bize anca bu yeni grubu desteklemek düşer. Fighting 1Punch !﻿

comments.text:
Por un momento pensé que eran hermanos XD he visto varios comentarios 
negativos sobre este grupo, en realidad no diría que es tan mal, la canción 
es bien, y bueno los chicos cantan bien; y con respecto al estilo 90 de la 
canción  tampoco dire mucho, la industrial musical coreana esta cambiando 
drasticamente, y todos estos cambios se veían venir, así que cuando veo 
estas cosas ya ni me sorprendo tanto como antes!!
Asi que fighting 1punch :)﻿
